question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Kuras upes krastā atrodas Upsalas centrs Zviedrijā?
answer: Upsalas centrs Zviedrijā atrodas pie Fyrisas upes (Fyrisån).
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is on the Fyrisån River.
